letters.description: Evaluate client's identity, strengths, challenges, and wellness goals within an LGBTQ+ affirming lens.
Develop coping mechanisms and strategies to navigate societal stressors and internalized stigma.
Facilitate exploration of sexual orientation, gender identity, and intersectional identities with self-acceptance.
Collaboratively establish achievable wellness objectives and action plans aligned with client's authentic self.
Support the client in cultivating self-advocacy, community engagement, and a fulfilling life aligned with their values.
